. Steve Ballmer formally introduced Windows 7 last month at an industry event in New York City. Steve Ballmer said Windows 7 is simple to use, responsive, and unobtrusively secure-all things Vista was not. The OS makes everyday use of a PC better, said Steve Ballmer . new home in the Italian city of Venice. According to MSN News, Johnny Depp bought the$ 14 million palace because he fell in love with the city while filming The Tourist opposite Angelina Jolie . My experience of Venice really happened between 10pm and 2am when the streets closed and I was able to walk around and experience the poetry of Venice, the ghosts of Venice, all those wonderful dark alleys, said Johnny Depp . He continued:`` For an actor being able to film within the confines of that magical city certainly helps. The city's magic shone through completely.'' EastEnders: Shirley agrees
